title: Statement by the Press Secretary | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
November 05, 2013

 



Statement by the Press Secretary




This evening, the President telephoned Virginia Governor-elect Terry McAuliffe, New York Mayor-elect Bill De Blasio and Boston Mayor-elect Martin Walsh.Â  He congratulated each of them on their election victories and vowed to work with them in the months ahead to expand economic opportunity for middle class families in their communities.
